body.p: The Author Component was designed as a separate product to provide the functionality of the standard Author mode. Recently (in version 14.2), the component API was extended to also allow multiple edit modes like Text and Grid. The component can be embedded either in a third-party standalone Java application or customized as a Java Web Applet to provide WYSIWYG-like XML editing directly in your web browser of choice.
The Author Component Startup Project for Java/Swing integrations is available online on the website as a Maven archetype. More information about the setup can be found here
